description.ko: 하이테크 건축물과 거친 도시 분위기가 조화를 이루며, NEON-V 특유의 강렬한 네온 광채로 빛나는 미래 지향적인 메가폴리스의 숨 막히는 전경입니다.
description.en: A breathtaking view of a futuristic megalopolis where high-tech architecture meets a gritty urban atmosphere, illuminated by the signature glow of the NEON-V palette.

prompt: Hyper-realistic cyberpunk cityscape at night, NEON-V aesthetic, cinematic lighting, towering skyscrapers with holographic advertisements, rain-slicked asphalt reflecting vibrant violet and electric blue neon lights, flying vehicles leaving light trails, atmospheric fog, high contrast, 8k resolution, intricate metallic textures.
